blogPost.excerpt: Assemble is an end-to-end project management platform for video producers and content creators. Production calendars, task lists, advanced file sharing & feedback, cloud storage and more.
blogPost.body: Assemble is an end-to-end project management platform for video producers and content creators. Production calendars, task lists, advanced file sharing & feedback, cloud storage and more.
blogPost.title: Assemble - Project management for content creators
blogPost.author: Tristan Pollock

localize.description: Assemble是一个为视频制作者和内容创作者提供的端到端项目管理平台。制作日历、任务列表、高级文件共享和反馈、云存储等。
localize.tagline: 内容创作者的项目管理

localize.description: Assemble是一個爲視頻製作者和內容創作者提供的端到端項目管理平臺。製作日曆、任務列表、高級文件共享和反饋、雲存儲等。
localize.tagline: 內容創作者的項目管理
